statements: UPDATE equipment_rentals SET equipment_name = 'Laptop' WHERE rental_id = 1

UPDATE equipment_rentals
SET equipment_name = 'Camera', rental_duration = 5, technical_requirements = 'Lighting setup'
WHERE rental_id = 101

UPDATE equipment_rentals
SET rental_duration = 3, technical_requirements = 'Tripod, Microphone', equipment_name = 'Projector'
WHERE rental_id = 102
UPDATE Equipment_Rentals SET rental_duration = 5 WHERE rental_id = 123;
UPDATE Technical_Requirements SET required_quantity = 10, technical_details = 'Updated specs' WHERE requirement_id = 456;
UPDATE Equipment_Rentals SET rental_duration = rental_duration + 1 WHERE rental_id = 1001;
UPDATE Technical_Requirements SET required_quantity = 3, technical_details = 'Updated technical requirements' WHERE requirement_id = 2005;
UPDATE track_equipment_rentals SET equipment_name = 'Sound System' WHERE rental_id = 1;
UPDATE technical_requirements SET quantity = 20 WHERE requirement_name = 'Microphones' AND equipment_type = 'Audio';
UPDATE track_equipment_rentals SET rental_duration = 7 WHERE rental_id = 101;
